name: PressTags
author: Trevor Fitzgerald

sections.description:
PressTags is a network for WordPress bloggers designed to help you discover relevant posts written by other WordPress bloggers.

Are you looking for topics to write? Want to see what other people in your industry are talking about?

It’s free to add your blog to PressTags. You’ll get new visitors who are interested in the topics you write.

Screencast

Get an idea of how it works by watching the video on the PressTags site here: http://presstags.com/about/
sections.installation:
The automatic plugin installer should work for most people. Manual installation is easy and takes fewer than five minutes.

1) Upload the presstags folder to wp-content/plugins
2) Activate the plugin from the Plugins page in your Dashboard
3) Optionally, configure the number of feed items to display on the dashboard widget. Click “Configure” in the title bar of the widget.
sections.faq:
How come there aren’t any posts displayed in the dashboard widget?

Make sure you’re using tags on your blog posts. The plugin looks to see what tags and categories you use most in order to recommend articles to you.
